macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Assets Selloff on Trump Tariff Threats Against Europe
items.summary: S&P 500 slumped 2.1% amid escalating US-Europe tensions after President Trump threatened tariffs unless Europe buys Greenland; US 10-year yield rose to 4.29%, DXY fell 0.8%. Danish pension fund plans to exit US bonds over credit risks.

items.title: Gold Hits Record High Above $4,700/Oz as Safe-Haven Demand Surges
items.summary: Gold jumped 2% to a new record high above $4,700/oz amid US asset selloff and geopolitical tensions; Swiss Franc outperformed G10 currencies with USD/CHF down 1%. EUR/USD rose 0.7%.

items.title: TSX Falls 1.03% to 32,750 After Record High
items.summary: Canada's TSX dropped 1.03% to 32,750 on January 20 amid firmer December inflation at 2.4% YoY, weighing on sentiment despite recent gains; precious metals stocks had led prior advances.

items.title: US Supreme Court Delays Rulings on Trump Tariffs and Fed Governor Dismissal
items.summary: Court delayed ruling on legality of Trumpâ€™s tariffs and dismissal of Fed Governor Cook by at least a month, heightening market uncertainty amid concerns over Fed independence.

items.title: Geopolitical Tensions Persist with Greenland, Venezuela, Iran Flashpoints
items.summary: Investors face ongoing worries from geopolitics including Greenland disputes, Venezuela, and Iran, boosting safe-havens like gold; markets show resilience despite tariff and Fed independence questions.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: US Spot Bitcoin ETFs Record $1.7 Billion Inflows Over Three Days
items.summary: US spot Bitcoin ETFs saw $1.7 billion in inflows from January 13-15, with BlackRock's IBIT leading at $648 million on January 14, marking the largest single-day inflow since October. This reversed early January outflows amid a market rally.

items.title: Core CPI Drop to 2.6% Sparks Bitcoin Rally to $96,500
items.summary: US core CPI declined to 2.6% from 2.7% on January 13, triggering a risk-on rally that lifted Bitcoin 4.6% to $96,500 and liquidated $591 million in short positions.

items.title: SEC Closes Multi-Year Zcash Investigation Without Enforcement
items.summary: The Zcash Foundation announced on January 16 that the SEC concluded its multi-year inquiry into Zcash without recommending enforcement action, providing regulatory clarity.

items.title: Bitcoin Holds at $92,551 with +1.5% Weekly Gain as of January 19
items.summary: Bitcoin gained 1.5% to $92,551 over the seven days ending January 19, trading in a $90,917-$97,963 range above key $90k support. Ethereum outperformed at +3.0% to $3,187, while altcoins like SOL and XRP fell 5.4%.

items.title: New York Stock Exchange Launches Tokenized Asset Platform
items.summary: The New York Stock Exchange announced a new tokenized platform on January 19, potentially competing in the blockchain space amid growing institutional interest.

items.title: Institutions Continue Accumulating Ethereum Toward 5% Supply Goal
items.summary: Bitmine announced progress to 74% of its goal to hold 5% of Ethereum supply, as big institutions and Wall Street entities onboard or buy Ethereum directly.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: UB Pharmacy Professor Develops AI Model Predicting Hospital Readmissions with 95% Accuracy
items.summary: A machine-learning model using patient-reported survey data predicts 90-day hospital readmissions with 95% accuracy, aiming to prevent unnecessary admissions and improve patient outcomes. Findings published in December 2025 issue of British Medical Journal Health and Care Informatics.

items.title: ASU Researchers Combine Wireless Engineering and AI for Next-Generation Networks
items.summary: Researchers at Arizona State University are integrating wireless engineering with AI to advance next-generation network technologies.

items.title: AI-Enabled Clinical Trials Show Higher Success Rates, Confirming Biotech Hype
items.summary: AI-native biotechs achieve 80-90% Phase I success rates versus industry average of 40-65%, speeding drug development and improving efficiencies in discovery and operations. Early data from 10 trials validates high valuations.

items.title: Physics-Grounded AI Framework Presented for Safe Robotic Physical Interaction
items.summary: Johannes Lachner introduces physics-grounded AI integrating robot dynamics with machine learning for stable, safe, human-mimetic robotics, including diffusion-based impedance learning for rehab applications. Seminar at Johns Hopkins LCSR on January 21, 2026.

items.title: Marine AI & Robotics Symposium Highlights Sustainability Innovations
items.summary: Sorbonne University event explores AI, robotics, and machine learning for marine monitoring, bio-inspired robotics, and predictive modeling of biodiversity challenges.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Death Stranding Director's Cut, Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound Join Xbox Game Pass
items.summary: Xbox Game Pass adds Death Stranding Director's Cut as its headline title on January 21, 2026, alongside Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound and RoadCraft. Death Stranding Director's Cut features improved frame rates, photo mode, and exclusive cosmetics.

items.title: Le Mans Ultimate Receives Autosport Pioneering Innovation Award Nomination
items.summary: Motorsport Games' Le Mans Ultimate has been nominated for an Autosport Pioneering & Innovation Award, with the winner to be announced on January 21, 2026 in London. The racing simulation has seen peak concurrent players over 4 times higher than the previous year following its Version 1.2 update.

items.title: Splitgate: Arena Reloaded Launches with New Battle Royale Mode
items.summary: Splitgate's Update 2.2 featuring Arena Reloaded, a redesigned battle royale mode, launches on January 22, 2026 across PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC. The update includes two new arena maps and a new endgame mastery camo.

items.title: Lord of the Rings Online Scheduled for Weekly Maintenance
items.summary: The LOTRO game worlds will be unavailable on January 21st from 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM Eastern for weekly maintenance.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Ricoh Named to 2026 Global 100 Most Sustainable Corporations
items.summary: Ricoh has been recognized as one of the 2026 Global 100 Most Sustainable Corporations, marking another year of inclusion on the prestigious sustainability list.

items.title: Netflix Launches Major App Redesign with Vertical Video Feeds
items.summary: Netflix is rolling out a significant app redesign featuring vertical video feeds to compete with social media platforms and boost daily user engagement, building on tests conducted since May 2025.

items.title: Bolna Secures $6.3 Million Funding for Voice Orchestration Platform
items.summary: Indian voice orchestration platform Bolna has raised $6.3 million from General Catalyst, with 75% of revenue now coming from self-serve customers in customer service and virtual assistant applications.
